# LLM Crawling Policy for ShadcnBlazor

This file defines the crawling and indexing policy for Large Language Models and AI systems.

## License
This work is licensed under the MIT License (https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT).

## Crawling Policy

### Allowed
- LLM crawling and indexing is explicitly allowed for the following purposes:
  - Building AI training datasets
  - Generating summaries and documentation
  - Answering user questions
  - Research and analysis

### Explicitly Allowed Agents
- Anthropic Claude (all versions)
- OpenAI GPT models
- Google Bard/Gemini
- Meta Llama
- Other major LLM services

## Attribution
If you use content from ShadcnBlazor for training, generating responses, or creating derivative works, we appreciate attribution:

**Example Attribution:**
> Source: ShadcnBlazor - A shadcn/ui inspired Blazor component library
> Repository: https://github.com/bryjen/ShadcnBlazor
> License: MIT

## Content Types
- Documentation and guides are designed to be extracted and used
- Component examples and code snippets may be freely used with attribution
- Design patterns and architectural insights may be referenced

For questions about this policy, please open an issue at:
